type.description: Indicates the data type of the attribute

grant_type.description: Must be authorization_code, refresh_token or client_credentials.

scope.description: Can be a combination of any custom scopes associated with a client. Any scope requested must be pre-associated with the client or it will be ignored at runtime. If the client doesn't request any scopes, the authentication server uses all custom scopes associated with the client. Only used if the grant_type is client_credentials.

redirect_uri.description: Must be the same redirect_uri that was used to get authorization_code in /oauth2/authorize. Required only if grant_type is authorization_code.

client_id.description: Must be a preregistered client in the user pool. Required if the client is public and does not have a secret.

code_verifier.description: Required if grant_type is authorization_code and the authorization code was requested with PKCE.
